flawed_nl_solution:
If in five years, Hania will be 45 years old, currently she is 45-5 = <<45-5=44>>44 years old.
Ten years ago, Hania was 44-10 = <<44-10=34>>34 years old.
Samir just turned half the age Hania was 10 years ago, which means she is 34/2 = <<34/2=17>>17 years old.
In five years, Samir will be 17+5 = <<17+5=22>>22 years old
#### 22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 44. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
